title: cidAnanda mUrtE
sahitya:
cidAnanda mUrtE shivApatE cidambarArpita kShEtra kIrtE


anupallavi

  sudhAkara dhrta sundara naTapatE dayA tarangita damita mahArthE


caraNam    surAsura gaNa stuta pratApapurAdi dahita mahA prahAsa
parAjita kAma prArthayE shankara virAja sundara vimukti prasAdhaka
